name: Daily Office Routine
description:
Tired of living an adventure everyday?  Wanna experience something really different? Then you MUST try Daily Office Routine!

Do a LOT of meaningless paperwork and hear bullshit of your boss screaming all day!

After that, you can drown your misery in litters of coffee! And all of that for a mere salary! Who wouldn't want that?

Find it on the Arcades nearest to you!

Code/Graphics/SFX: Zacarias Vieira

Music: Rolemusic
